aahara uddhamanaya akhandawa adu wima ha hithakara padanam balapama hethuwen kolambaa paribhogika mila darshakaya (ko.pa.mi.da.) matha padanam wu mathupita uddhamanaya, 2018 wasare marthu masayedi thawaduratath mandagami wiya. 2018 wasare palamu masa deka thula jathika paribhogika mila darshakaya (ja.pa.mi.da.) matha padanam wu uddhamanayehi da ewani adu wime prawanathawak daknata labuni.

ee wage padeswala kala athulata yaddi me minimas kana nittawangen parissam wena eka thamayi agata guna.waddange purawruththawalata anuwa itha aadi kalaye waddan dadayame gos sathun maraddi,ee wagema palathuru mi pani ekathu karanna yaddi wanarode hitapu nittawange sahasika praharawalata waddanwa hasu wi thibenawa.nittawanta wen wu wenama bala predsha owun nirmanaya karagena thibenawa.ee bala predshawalata waddan athulu wuwahoth owun waddanwa ghathanaya karanawa kiyala thamayi ema purawruththawala dakwenne.kalayak yaddi nittawan wisin wadi gamwalata rathriye athulu wela wadi patawun ( wadi daruwan) allagena gihin thiyenawa.mema kenahilikam iwasagatha nohakiwa waddan wisin sanwidhanaya wi nittawan wishala pramanayak wasaya karana len saha guhawala doratuwalata wishala gal saha li kotan yoda haras kota dina 3-4 k wasa thaba owunwa guha thalama kusaginne miya yamata salaswa athi bawayi purawruththawala dakwenne.
